alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 3:54AM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation with mainly freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations from freezing rain may approach one-quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of east central, southeast and southern Oklahoma and northern Texas. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Oklahoma, for the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7. In Texas, for the latest road conditions call 800 4 5 2 9 2 9 2 for road information.
